item.description: SAVE THE DATE - 2011 Tower Toot Mark your calendars today - the Friends of Heublein Tower "Tower Toot" annual fundraiser will be held on Saturday, October 15th. Hike up the Talcott Mountain Tower Trail and enjoy the spectacular view of the Farmington Valley. Music, food and fun will be served all day. The only public access to the tower is by foot, through the Talcott Mountain State Park. The shortest and most popular route is the 1.25 mile Tower Trail, which can be accessed from an ample paved parking lot located on Route 185 in Simsbury. We'll meet at this parking lot at the bottom of the trail at 10:00 AM.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be there at the bottom of the trail.

group.name: The West Hartford Over 40 Fun Bunch!

item.name: Hike the Trail to HeubleinTower for the 2011 Tower Toot and Spectacular Views
